entries.content: Moti asked about our module refactoring approach. Reviewing our established ultra-modular refactoring methodology that we've applied across 20+ components.

Creating ultra-modular refactoring plan for ClaudeFormatter.js (222 lines, cyclomatic complexity ~25). Main challenge: extracting character-by-character state machine while preserving exact streaming behavior and cross-chunk state persistence.

ClaudeFormatter ultra-modular refactoring completed. Transformed 222-line monolith (complexity ~25) into 80-line orchestrator + 12 micro-components organized in 4 subsystems. Build shows pre-existing TS warnings unrelated to our JS changes. Added HTML escaping for XSS prevention, eliminated 3x bold logic duplication.

Successfully completed ClaudeFormatter ultra-modular refactoring. Moti is happy with the results. Architecture: 116-line orchestrator + 12 micro-components in 4 subsystems (state, validation, html, parsing).
